description: DOWNLOAD AND SAVE! Save an extra $25 on select hotels on your first app booking when you use promo code DOWNLOAD25. Just book by 3/31/16 and travel by 6/30/16 for 2 nights or longer. *See full terms at: http://www.orbitz.com/mobile . ***** "Best Travel App" -- 2014 APPY Awards Orbitz is the #1 way to book travel on your mobile device. Designed for Android phones and tablets, the Orbitz app lets you quickly and easily search and book hotel rooms (including last-minute bookings and mobile-only deals up to 50% off), flights, vacation packages, and rental cars without leaving the app. Plus, join Orbitz Rewards and start earning Orbucks when you book flights (1%), hotels (5%), and vacation packages (1%) -- you can instantly redeem Orbucks on hotels! You can also view booked itineraries, check for flight delays during travel, and get trip reminders via Google Now. Orbitz offers a simple, secure booking process, a Best Price Guarantee, and 24x7 customer support. UNRIVALED SPEED & EASE OF USE: Search and book flights, hotels, vacation packages, and rental cars without leaving the app. Use convenient features like Google+ or Facebook sign-in plus Google Wallet to book in a flash. GREAT DEALS, EVEN AT THE LAST-MINUTE: Ability to book last-minute, including convenient "nearby tonight" option for hotels. Plus, take advantage of new app-only deals all the time: Exclusive savings off our best hotels! And don't forget you can save up to $775 when booking flight+hotel together*. FABULOUS REWARDS PROGRAM: Join Orbitz Rewards and earn Orbucks on your flight (1%), hotel (5%), and vacation package (1%) bookings that you can instantly redeem on hotels in the app! USEFUL HOTEL INFORMATION: See hotels plotted on a map, swipe through photo galleries, and read comprehensive reviews from travelers. CONVENIENT TRAVEL TOOLS: View your itineraries 24x7 – even offline. Get info on flight delays and gate changes, plus directions to your hotel. And when you book with a Gmail address, you'll get flight status, hotel check-in, and rental car pick-up reminders on day of travel if you use Google Now (Android v4.1+ Jellybean users). TRUSTED NAME: Enjoy a secure booking process, 24x7 customer service, no Orbitz fees on hotel cancellations or changes, plus our Best Price Guarantee: Orbitz customers who find their same prepaid hotel room, flight, or car for a lower price online may receive rewards equal to price difference + bonus of up to $200 to be used on a future hotel booking. * Save $775 when booking flight+hotel together: Savings based on Flight + Hotel vacation package bookings of 5 or more nights with individual calculable components on www.orbitz.com from October 1, 2014 through March 31, 2015, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates, and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages. APP PERMISSIONS ---------------------- • Device & app history: The app uses this to manage its own tasks and offer an improved experience when you switch between different sections of the app. • Identity: The app uses this so that Google+ users can sign in to their account on the app. • Location: The app uses this to allow you to search for hotels, airports, and other places near your current location. • Photos/Media/Files: The app uses this to display Google Maps. For example, you can toggle to a map-based view of hotel search results within the app.

description: Use this App, and have everyone gawking at your creative talent! Doesn’t matter whether they be pictures or photographs, this App helps you create identical images. Draw identical copies of the images that appear on the Live View Screen – it will be as if you’re drawing with tracing paper(Tracing Phone)! Show off drawings created by yours truly! ★ Keep your smart phone steady with objects you find around the house, such as a thick dictionary, a book, or even a cup, in order to create better results. Using a smart phone holder is also another option. ★ In order to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, make sure that the background of the photograph is bright, as brighter the background, the better chances of being able to trace more precisely. This App allows you to become an illustrator, an artist. Want to be able to draw your versions of pretty, adorable comic characters? Want to draw a picture of our favorite celebrity? What to draw a beautiful picture of your family and loved ones? Want to draw a picture of your dream car? You don’t need to resister at an art school to learn to draw awesome pictures. Show off, or even offer these self-drawn pictures as presents to those around you. You can draw anything – from a photograph you have just taken to your favorite celebrity, a cool car, or even another drawing you have always liked. You can take a picture of your family then use it as a drawing tool, or even draw a picture of your loved one’s face on to a letter and have it sent. You can also select the type of picture you want to draw, you even trace a photograph in your photo gallery. To take advantage of this application, you can finish with oilpaper(transparent paper) or tracing reap the benefits of using a light box. It can also be utilized for children’s art education purposes. *Due to specific patents on this App, creating similar Apps may raise copyright issues. How to use: 1.Either choose a picture of your choice or even take an instant photograph. Fix your phone steady, choose to ‘draw’, then prepare to start your drawing. 2.When the tracing paper appears on screen, trace the image carefully by looking at the smart phone’s live view screen. Remember to switch on and off the options that make both the tracing paper, as well as the focus indicator, appear and disappear. 3.Once you are done tracing out a basic sketch of the image, adjust the transparency of the smart phone to control color, shading, and even texture, in order to express yourself. 4.If the focus of the Live View seems unsteady, switch on the automatic focus finder button to adjust the focus of the picture. Switch it off once you are ready once again. 5.Also, if you want to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, you need not do it on-site. Take it somewhere you are comfortable with, choose the “draw picture of image in photo gallery” option to view the photograph. You will be able to create a beautiful drawing of the image that had been saved on to your phone.

description: This app provides 1. Over 500 of the newest NYS Regents questions. 2. Regents practice quizzes by topic. 3. Full interactive regents exams. 4. Interactive swipe vocabulary flashcards. Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad, android, tablets and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. Physics Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning about the Physics. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. Physics Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning Physics, but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient.

description: The ultimate app for sports bettors! Sports odds, spreads and lines from multiple sportsbooks, all the live scores, breaking injury updates, up-to-date line movements, and a community of bettors all in the palm of your hand with the #1 sports odds & live scores app! Join the global sports betting community today and discuss today’s action, opening odds, line moves, injuries and everything else. Whether you like to bet on the NFL, NBA, MLB or NHL, this is the must have app for you, especially for any trips to Vegas. The only app that has easy access to all the Vegas and international sportsbook odds on all the live games. Follow games in all the major North American leagues: NFL Football, NCAA (College) Football & NCAA (College) Basketball, MLB Baseball, NBA Basketball and NHL Hockey. Live sports scores and breaking injury updates from all the international soccer leagues like Barclay’s Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, and more. Recently added coverage for all the Latin American soccer leagues such as Liga MX, Brazilian Serie A and Argentinian Premier League. With Onside Sports you get access to international soccer as well as American football, basketball, hockey and baseball. Get advanced stats on all the games to help you make an informed sports betting choices. In addition to having advanced stats at your fingertips, Onside is an active sports betting community where you can make picks and see predictions from a community of sports betting experts and handicappers. With tens of millions of sports picks made, it is easily the largest such community on mobile today. We are a sports only community built by sports bettors because they wanted a better experience for checking live scores and odds. We offer: • FREE real time scores and box scores - Live sports scores and breaking injury updates from the top sports leagues in the world: NFL Football, NCAA (College) Football & Basketball, MLB Baseball, NBA Basketball and NHL Hockey, Barclay’s Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Bundesliga Soccer, Serie A Soccer, UEFA Champions & Europa Leagues, Liga MX, Argentine Premier Division and many more. • FREE access to sportsbook betting odds and line moves from top Vegas and global sports books - including first half & second half lines, first five innings for baseball and much more. For soccer bettors we offer 1 X 2, asian handicaps, point spreads, over/under totals, moneylines, runlines and pucklines. The most complete set of odds outside of a sportsbook or Vegas on any mobile app. Including real-time notifications on halftime spreads for football and basketball. • The fastest, most accurate push notifications on scores, betting line changes and breaking injury updates. Personalize the push notifications for free in our game alerts panel and never miss a beat on any of your games. • Vegas style pick'em pools to compete with friends across any sport based on all the real betting lines: spreads, totals, halftimes, and more. • Follow your favorite teams from the MLB, NFL, NCAA (College) Football, NCAA (College) Basketball, NBA and NHL, Barclay’s Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, UEFA Champions & Europa Leagues, Liga MX, Argentine Premier Division, or just follow a game. • Deep and insightful matchup stats on every game. See a detailed breakdown of all the information you need to bet on games with consensus, lines from multiple sportsbooks and team records against the lines. • Make virtual sports picks on any game and track your performance. Share your picks with the community and start a discussion. See other people’s picks and finds find experts and handicappers for every league and bet type. Over 10 million picks have been made! • A sports betting community. Chat your people in the app, tweet your picks or just post your opinions on lines and games. Try the app today! If you like it invite your friends. Please send us your feedback - we review all comments including new feature requests.

description: Trainline is the #1 downloaded train app in the UK. Join over 6.5 million people and get the most up-to-date rail information. We are all about making rail travel easy: • Plan your next journey. Trainline work with all train operators in the UK. • Review all journey options available and pick the best one for you. • Save your railcard to get the right fares. • Book your next trip in seconds. • Check live departure and arrival times. • Find your platform and follow the live progress of your train. • View station information including maps and local taxi numbers direct to your mobile. We help you save on your booking by highlighting the cheapest prices for your next national rail journey. Benefit from great savings when buying your train tickets in advance. You can collect your tickets from over 1,000 stations in the UK, or, save time by selecting the mobile ticket option and go paperless on selected routes** The train operators release rail tickets 12 weeks before the date of travel so whether you are commuting or want to travel further around the UK, the earlier you book the better. We also offer a live ticket alert service that you can sign up to and we will notify you direct on your mobile when the cheapest advance fares for your journey are released. Get the Trainline app today and get access to live train information, and timetables, find out about disruptions, and re-plan your journey on the go. *Average savings with Advance fares vs buying on arrival at the station on the day of travel. Selected routes only, subject to availability. **Mobile tickets are only available on selected routes. For more information visit:  http://www.thetrainline.com/mobile/app/ We always respect your privacy, check this page to see the reasons we need to ask for permissions: http://ttlandroidapp.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4565 Follow Trainline on: Our blog http://blog.thetrainline.com/ Facebook https://www.facebook.com/thetrainlinecom Twitter https://twitter.com/thetrainline Google + https://plus.google.com/+trainline/posts
release_text: + mobile tickets bugs fixed + Share your train travels. Send your booked train departure and arrival times as a ticket image to your spouse/friends/colleagues. + Mobile tickets icon. It's now easier to spot if your route supports mobile tickets, there's a small alert and a little green icon. + No more 'billing address' needed to buy a ticket. + Edit your card's expiry date. + Cleaner search results.

description: The Whole Pantry is the first of its kind, combining inspiring wholefood recipes with Lifestyle and Wellness Guides. We don’t want to convert anyone from one diet or lifestyle to another, but rather encourage more of the basic foods (fruits and veggies) back into our diets where possible. TWP gives you a ‘back to basics’ approach to both cooking and nutrition, providing a wholefoods base for any dietary preference or lifestyle. Our meals are all created with its benefits in mind, to improve sleep, lose weight, clear skin, reduce allergies, better digestion or balance moods – we’ve got it covered! NEW CONTENT AND APP RELAUNCH COMING EARLY 2015! •52 premium recipes (entirely gluten free, vegetarian paleo and vegan friendly) • 10 health, wellness and lifestyle guides/articles • Recommended - A library/resources list of favourite books, blogs, website and documentaries. (non interactive) •Leading design, photography and interface •Shopping list - email to your phone •Multiple photos for each recipe • Recipe indicators to mark recipes as gluten free, dairy free, vegan and/or raw. • Conversion tool – switch from metric to imperial via the submenu. •Save your favourite recipes and guides • Share what you’ve been cooking or reading with your friends on Facebook and Twitter! Please help spread the word and leave a friendly review the app in the Play Store! For support, feedback or questions, please email info@thewholepantryapp.com . New Lifestyle and Cookbook available via our website www.thewholepantryapp.com
release_text: •52 premium recipes (entirely gluten free, vegetarian paleo and vegan friendly) •10 health, wellness and lifestyle guides •Our Pantry - A resources list of favourite books, blogs, website and documentaries (non interactive) •Leading design, photography and interface •Shopping list - email to your phone •Multiple photos for each recipe •Recipe indicators •Conversion tool •Save your favourite recipes and guides •Share what you’ve been cooking or reading with your friends •Monthly updates!

description: TimeWatch - פתרון נוכחות חכם, המאפשר דיווח, ניהול ובקרה של שעות העבודה של העובדים בעסק, בכל זמן ומכל מקום. דיווח הנוכחות במערכת TimeWatch יכול להתבצע ע"י העובדים במגוון דרכים: דיווח באינטרנט, דיווח באמצעות הטלפון הנייח והנייד, דיווח באמצעות SMS, דיווח באפליקציה, דיווח בשעוני נוכחות ביומטריים וקירבה ועוד. מערכת TimeWatch בעלת ממשק ידידותי ונוח למשתמש, ועל כן מתאימה לכל סוגי העסקים והעובדים! מערכת TimeWatch כוללת מגוון רחב של כלים ניהוליים ושימושיים, שהופכים את דיווחי הנוכחות לאמינים ומדויקים, מצמצמים באופן ניכר את זמן הכנת השכר, והכי חשוב - חוסכים לארגון כסף רב:  עדכון נתוני הנוכחות וההיעדרות של העובדים (חופשה, מחלה, וכו').  קבלת תזכורות בזמן אמת על העדר דיווחי נוכחות של העובדים – לצורך השלמת דיווחי הנוכחות.  קבלת התראות בזמן אמת על דיווחי הנוכחות של העובדים באמצעות דוא"ל / SMS (.  חסימת/הגבלת דרכי דיווח שאינן רצויות.  צפייה בזמן אמת בסטאטוס נוכחות העובדים במקום העבודה בכל זמן נתון.  משלוח דו"ח נוכחות לעובדים באמצעות דוא"ל.  הפקת דו"חות מגוונים בחתכים שונים, לרבות דו"ח מרוכז למייצג/הנה"ח לצורך הכנת השכר.  דיווח משימות.  בניית הסכמי עבודה גמישים כולל חישוב שעות נוספות, חג, שבת וכו'. אנו מאמינים, על סמך ניסיוננו, כי השימוש במערכת Timewatch חוסך לארגון כסף רב וזמן ניכר, ומשפר בצורה משמעותית את תהליך הכנת השכר, תוך תאום מלא עם דרישות הדין ופסיקת בתי הדין לעבודה. לפרטים נוספים: 1-700-073-002 או בדוא"ל: timewatch@lshv.co.il TimeWatch - Smart Presence solution that enables reporting, management and control of work hours of employees in the business, anytime and anywhere. Reported presence in TimeWatch can be done by working in a variety of ways: online reporting, reporting by phone fixed and mobile, SMS reporting, reporting, application, reporting, attendance clocks biometric and proximity and more. TimeWatch system has friendly interface and easy to use, and therefore suitable for all types of businesses and employees! TimeWatch system includes a variety of management tools and useful, that make attendance reports to be reliable and accurate, significantly reduces preparation time wage, and most importantly - save the organization money:  data update presence and absence of employees (vacation, illness, etc.).  Receive reminders about the lack of real-time reports of the presence of workers - for the completion of the present report.  Get real-time alerts on reports of the presence of employees via email / SMS (.  blocking / limiting unwanted reporting methods.  View real-time status absenteeism in the workplace at any time.  employee attendance report delivery via email.  producing reports varied in different segments, including condensed report as representing / Accounting for the preparation of salary.  reporting tasks.  construction of flexible work agreements including calculating overtime, holiday, Saturday, etc.. We believe, based on our experience, the use of the system Timewatch saving the organization money and considerable time, and significantly improves the process of preparing wages, while coordinating fully with statutory requirements and the ruling Labour Courts. For more information: 1-700-073-002 or email: timewatch@lshv.co.il

app_name: What's On India : TV Guide App
description: “A must-have app for all TV junkies!” – The Times of India "The best free app is Whats-On-India, because it’s fast and simple." – MINT Quickly see what’s on TV, mark your favorite channels & shows, set reminders, and discover new shows. Winner: Forbes Top Start-Ups to watch for, CNBC TV 18 Top 10 Start-Ups - 2010 App Features: * 7 days forward schedules for 700+ channels * Select your Cable or DTH Operator and get channel numbers * Set Reminder alerts via Notifications, Device Calendar, SMS and Email * Create your Personalized TV Watchlist with Favorites, Reminders & Recommendations * Search movies & shows by actor, director, etc * Movie trailers and TV show promo videos The app features a neatly organized set of buttons to get you to the best movies, sports matches, TV shows and events happening on TV. This app puts at your fingertips a comprehensive program guide with the date, time, star cast and synopsis of your favorite programs and movie schedules. The Whats-On-India app covers all major Indian languages like English, Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Marathi, Malayalam, Bengali, Kannada, etc. Website : http://www.whatsonindia.com
release_text: Bug fixes and performance improvement. We have added 3 key features basis user feedbacks: 1. Date filter on Movies tab and other program lists under Categories 2. Toggle view in Movies tab to switch from grid view to list view 3. Simplified Operator selection under preferences

description: 2014-05-01 이후 서비스 및 업데이트가 중단됩니다. 그동안 많은 버그 피드백해주신 모든 분께 감사의 말씀 드립니다. 기타 자세한 사항은 이메일 regame1859@gmail.com 을 통해 자유롭게 보내주세요. 소스코드는 MIT라이센스로 자유롭게 배포 중이니 https://github.com/devflow/hoseotable 를 참조하시기 바랍니다. ------------------------------------------------------------------ 인트라넷과 연동하여 빠르게 정확한 시간표를 보여줍니다 원하는 학기(1,2학기 하계,동계)와 학년도를 지정할 수 있습니다. 강의 정보에서 강의를 듣는 학생들 서로 이야기를 나누고, 과제를 공유할 수 있습니다. 또한 채플시간 좌석을 기억하고 있지 않아도 좌석을 알 수 있습니다. 위젯기능이 있으며, 간편하게 다음 강의, 강의 시간등 정보를 얻을 수 있습니다. 메인화면 메뉴->의견 제출로 버그신고 & 의견제출을 할 수 있으니, 많은 의견 제공과 버그신고 부탁드립니다. * 호서대학교 학사정보시스템(인트라넷)을 이용가능한 학생만 사용 가능합니다. * 예전 변경사항 v.1.6.2 (Build 11) * 강의 색상 변경 가능 * 빈 강의에 스케쥴 등록 기능 * 반응속도 최적화 v.1.6.1 (Build 10) * 강의정보 글 페이징 추가. * 메모리 최적화. * 위젯 버그 수정, * 강의정보에서 남/여 구분 * 학과, 성별, 이름 정보 수집, (강의정보 가독성을 위해) v1.5 (Build 9)  * 변경된 시간표 시간 수정.  * 서버 이전으로 인한 데이터 최적화.  * 1학기 기간에 2학기로 되는 문제점 수정. v1.4.1 (Build 8)  * 버그 수정. v1.4 (Build 7)  * 색상 변경 방법 변경.  * UI 변경.  * 시간표 16교시 추가.  * 서버 다운되도 작동하도록 수정.   v1.3 (Build 6)  * 강의정보 추가..  * 로그인, 메모리 최적화  * 기타 버그 수정. v1.2 (Build 5) * 학년/학기 선택가능. * 시간표 불러오는 알고리즘 수정 * 위젯 시간 표시 버그 수정 * 기타 버그 수정 v1.1 (Build 4) * 위젯 새로고침 시간 짧게 설정 * 위젯 투명 설정 추가 * 강의 시간 약간씩 다르게 변경 * 리포트 기능 버그 수정 * 3G, WiFi 불가능일때에도 시간표 조회 가능하게 변경 * 기타 버그 수정. v1.0 (Build 3) * 최초 릴리즈 ---------------------------------------------------------------------- 키워드 : 호서, 호서대, 호서대학교, 시간표, 호서시간표, 호서대 시간표, 호서대 강의 시간표, 강의, 호서대 강의 시간, 호서 버스, 호서인 2014-05-01 After the service is stopped and updates. description: ** Sources code are open: https://bitbucket.org/duongphuhiep/unittab ** This is a Universal Unit Converter. UnitTab (old name: Smart Unit Converter) is packed with 1200+ units separated into 90+ categories: - No ads (but require Network Access to get Currency Exchange Rates) - Easy to select a unit by typing anything related to it ("km", "length", "distant"..) - Currency Converter with Smart (and configurable) live-update rates. - Precision level is configurable base on your needs. - History of recently used units. - Target filtering. - Clean interface and Smart behavior. In order to make a conversion, most of Unit converter Apps requires to select a category, then select a base unit, a target unit.. UnitTab is the only one that filter text to quickly select a unit and simplify the procedure. (The traditional procedure is also supported anyway) Almost conversion data is built base on ConvertPad - the most popular Unit Converter app on the Android platform. ** About the filtering ** For example: you want to convert from °F to °C. You type "f" to search for °F. You'll find many results (because there are many units which contain "f"). You want to narrow the filter, however you might not know the full name of °F (is Fahrenheit). But you know that °F represents a temperature, so you can search for "f temp" ("f" space "temp").. and bingo! ** About currencies exchanges ** - Most currency converter use two-steps conversions, for example: to convert 500 EUR to JPY, it firstly converts 500 EUR to USD then convert from USD to JPY. So these apps have to store (and update) only the exchange rates data of USD. If they support for 160 currencies, they will store and update only 160 rates numbers each time. - UnitTab tries to get (and to store offline) the direct exchange rates data EUR-JPY whenever possible in order to make direct-conversion from EUR to JPY. In the reverse case, you want to convert from JPY to EUR, UnitTab will not (even) re-use the previous EUR-JPY rate IF the direct rate JPY-EUR is available. In other words, UnitTab tries to manage 160^2 rates numbers. - But the 160^2 rates numbers are too much to be available or to be retrieved from the Internet. UnitTab implements a sophisticate calculation policy to make currency conversion as accurate as possible depends on data it needed and data it can retrieve. Basically, It makes direct-conversion whenever possible, otherwise inverse-conversions or two-steps conversions to give you the best approximation. - You can force UnitTab use two-steps conversions (like others Currency Converter apps) in Settings > "L.U Only Usd Rates" > "Yes". For some currencies, this way might give a more accurate result. - The exchange rates data of UnitTab comes from TheMoneyConverter.com (for 90 principals currencies) and from Yahoo Finance (for the others). Please let me know if there are more reliable FREE data sources. - Background Update of Currency Rate is not supported for now. So nothing run behind your back. ** About the interface ** - No fancy icons or images to keep the app package as small as it should be. - Highlight relevant information. - UnitTab does not want to change the default Android interface. But a minimal of theming (tweaks) is necessary to keep a professional looking across different Android versions. ** Blog post ** http://duongphuhiep.blogspot.fr/2012/11/unittab-unit-converter-on-android-whats.html More features will come. Keep your installation up to date. Feedback is welcome. Please mail to me instead of giving an unfavorable rate. Thank you.
release_text: 1.5.7 - Fix: Allow negative numbers. 1.5.6 - Speed up the calculation (Give a good rate here if you are impressed). - New: increase [Setting > Input Delay] to decrease the on-fly calculation speed (decrease CPU usage) -> save battery. - New or Normal users are recommended to select [Explorer > Menu > Enable Commons units] 1.5.5 - Shorten application name: UnitTab - Chose "L.U Only Usd Rates" (on Settings) will force two-steps conversions. - Improve: numbers format and precision settings.

description: Are you playing the stock market? You will stay informed of all the news with the “Stock Exchange”! The application allows you to keep track of the latest changes stock prices in international stock markets. Thanks to user-friendly interface, you can adjust the application settings specifically for yourself and feel comfortable enjoying the things you love. The application allows you to add unlimited number of companies to the menu. You can search for them using their exchange name or symbol. Using the system of schedules you can adjust the viewing of detailed information about a particular company in the market, and looking over the time intervals of schedules you can determine if the stock prices trend upwards or downwards. Basic features of the application: • 11 different types of schedules for each company, allowing you to track upward or downward trends of specific stock prices; • the opportunity to look through the schedules of different time periods: the menu includes daily, weekly, monthly and yearly schedules, as well as demonstrative schedules for the entire term of sales of stocks; • viewing all the information about the stocks of the company, which includes indicators of the current value, volume, rising or falling prices percent, the lowest and highest point, averages and other important characteristics; • elegant, user-friendly interface of the application that allows you to understand everything quickly and adjust the menu for yourself; • comfortable and easy controls; • user-friendly search system and addition of companies using their names or symbols in the stock market; • the ability to work in standalone mode without network connection using the latest data loaded; • work in active mode. The application allows the screen always stay unlocked, which significantly reduces the operating time; • automatic updating of data after a set amount of time. This app will keep you informed of recent changes in the financial market, you will be able to keep track of the world's major indices, exchange rates and commodity prices. With the “Stock Exchange” you can invest you funds easily and without any risk, control over the state of the selected stocks and increase your income at any time. The convenient mobile app “Stock Exchange” will allow skilled players to earn money in any place and at any time. You will be able to invest in stocks of any international companies and get the maximum profit by implementing permanent price control using intuitive interface management of the application.

description: Easily send video clips, pictures, music, and other large files from your Android device to an e-mail address in as little as two clicks. With this application you can: - Browse your SD card files and folders, - Pick a recipient from your Android contacts, - Send a photo or a video directly from the Gallery to your recipient. The app utilizes the free Email Large File web service to deliver large files within minutes. How it all works: - the selected file is uploaded to the EmailLargeFile.com server, and the link is e-mailed to your recipient. - you get a notification when the file link is e-mailed, and when your recipient downloads your file. Files uploaded from Android devices stay available on EmailLargeFile.com for 7 days. The Free version of the application allows you to upload up to 200Mb of data per day. We are upgrading our servers and this limit will be lifted shortly. Important: please verify with your phone/internet service provider for any data transfer charges or limitations. With any questions or suggestions, please contact us at contact@emaillargefile.com .
release_text: Version 2.0 updates and fixes: - increased maximum file size to 200Mb, - fixed Android 4.x compatibility, up to 4.4 (Kit Kat), - fixed Address book reuse issue, - added support for multiple Sender email addresses, - added support for multiple Recipient email addresses, - updated Upload progress screen to include From and To emails, and Start button, - updated user interface. Version 1.1 addresses an issue with the default Android device account. It also features a slightly updated interface.

Also if there are gas stations open for 24 hours, is also shown with a 24 on the icon. As if this were not enough if you click on any one you can askl the phone to take you up to there using the map application you have installed on your phone.

description: Clover Stylus Checker is a benchmark application for the stylus or touch panel. In particular, This app implements a measurement of performance that affect the usability of the paint application. MEASUREMENT FEATURES: - "Delay Guide animation" to be used for measurement of the delay (Delay of stroke display when you move the pen tip of the stylus） - From the event information acquired the ability to analyze and display the time resolution (coordinate scan rate) of the digitizer - Display of the basic performance of the stylus and touch panel （Device type / maximum multi touch / button(hovering) / pressure stage / pressure range / tilt range / orientation range / distance range, etc...) - Benchmark that specializes in processing that frequent in a paint app using the brush of Clover Paint - Real-time display of information received from the stylus or touch panel PEN STROKE DRAWING : In addition to those above, the program is optimized with the aim of drawing stroke very low-latency in Clover SC. (In ideal conditions, Clover SC is reduced to 50ms delay compared with Clover Paint v1.18.7) And you are able to experience, by enabling the "Predictive Factor" of pen strokes from the Setting further, when the terminal low delay was achieved in the future. The delay that occurring in Clover SC app is 10 ~ 20ms at most. (This is the deviation of 1mm ~ 2mm about when you move the stylus to match the delay Guide animation speed) KEY MAPPING : - Flip view horizontal [Tap three fingers] - Flip canvas color(white/black) [Swipe↓ three fingers] - Canvas erases [Swipe→ three fingers] - Undo [Stylus button 1/Volume↓] - Redo [Stylus button 2/Volume↑] - Eraser [Stylus button 1 holding + touch] - Open main menu [BACK] - Terminate of the App [BACK tap and hold] * There is not the setting of the color and thickness of the brush. * Eraser can be assigned to the volume button. * The pen pressure range is normalized by the pen pressure range that detected after app startup. Please break-in before use it, write to the canvas by the pen once for the first time in the pen pressure range to be used. NOTES : This app that aims to (limited-feature, simple, high-speed, low-latency) direction of the opposite of the Clover Paint (rich-feature). It is an experimental application for checking whether how many users appreciate that is worth app. In Android OS, and the tablet is indifferent to the delay of the display, the delay has become very large compared to the PC or the like. In conjunction with this, Clover Paint is implemented without regard to delay. On the other hand, in the paint application user, in a fact, there is the people who attach very importance to low-latency and feeling of the drawing. However, due to delay of the terminal and in Android OS, at present, limit will come immediately even if aim low-latency by app. Things that are not measured as an objective number, there is a tendency to not improved very much, it is rather worse. Therefore, through I create the app like this, you will be able to measure the delay objectively. If you want a low-latency environment, then to publish on the Web by measuring the delay of the various terminals by using this app, please putting some pressure on the manufacturer of the terminal. And, if you want a paint application that was focused on low-latency, or if you agree with the spirit of the above, would like to help me, would appreciate to purchase apps therefore there offers a donation version. Currently, donation version does not change with this benchmark version, but I am planning to can be used as a paint application by adding little by little functionality to the donation version in the future if exist many people who want paint apps low-latency on Android. (if exist many supporters who purchased the donation version Clover SC) Please see the blog for more information. http://goo.gl/whUi1 (Consideration about delay) http://goo.gl/eYZsF (Users manual) (Sorry, it is only Japanese)

Also, because of the possible to the background run on a regular basis every day, it is possible to evolve new follow at one-day intervals, the history of the unfollow without launching the app. ■ Function It also has the following functions. • Multiple user login (OAuth) And mutual follow user display User display that you're following User display that is follow And new follow user display And new unfollow user display Access to Twitter from the user display Access to the user Web page from the user display Access to the user display from favstar And follow-up from the user display Follow released from the user display Block from the user display · History save new follow, follow-release Export in HTML data - Backup and restore to the SD of data · Automatic Updates of specifying the time And follow-up of any user of the acquired, follower status display · Follow common between users of any previously retrieved common follower extract and display [Search for Keyword] You're No Yuku left Roman Kore, Forokore, this Roman, Twitter, follow, followers, Pochitta, pochitter, thus hole, element, personnel Tta
release_text: Ver 1.82 ・バックグラウンド更新が失敗する不具合を修正しました。 Ver 1.81 ・フォロー、アンフォロー、ブロックでの通信エラーを修正しました。 Ver 1.80 ・作成時期が新しいユーザーで通信エラーが発生する不具合を修正しました。 ・解像度の高い端末で画像が小さく表示される現象を修正しました。 Ver 1.72 ・Twitter API仕様変更により通信エラーが発生したいた問題に対応しました。 Ver 1.71 ・連続してブロック、アンフォローできない不具合を修正しました。 Ver 1.70 ・ブロックしているユーザ一覧の表示に対応しました。 Ver 1.65 ・アンフォロー、ブロック時に確認ダイアログを表示するようにしました。 Ver 1.64 ・Twitter API 1.0の廃止によりTwitter API 1.1へ移行しました。これに伴い取得できるユーザー数が最大約35000人(1時間毎に回復)から最大約18000人(15分毎に回復)に減少しております。 ・通信エラーが発生する場合はログイン画面より再度「新規ユーザ登録」を行ってください。

description: * AD FREE VERSION OF My CookBook Recipe Manager Store all your favorite recipes in one place! My CookBook is a recipe manager with search and import features. My CookBook lets you create your own digital cookbook. Build your own recipe database by gathering recipes on the web and using the import features. It is you and your own cookery! You are looking for a new recipe ? Use our searching engine to find a new recipe on the web. When you have found one you like, import it into My CookBook. Then you will be able to view it everywhere on your phone or your tablet. You can add your own photo, change ingredients or directions, or add you own comments You already have a cookbook ? Add a new recipe into My CookBook manually, or import your digital cookbook using one of the file formats we support like Meal Master (.mmf), MasterCook (.mxp), LivingCookBook (.fdx) , ReKconv (.rk)... You want to share some recipes with your friends ? Invite your friends to join My CookBook, share your recipes with them and view their recipes. Or share your recipes on Facebook or by email, sms, and others. You can also send them a “My CookBook” file they will be able to load into their app My CookBook also includes these features : • Create shopping lists using your recipe ingredients • Synchronize your recipes on different devices using dropbox • Scale the ingredients to serve more or less people • Use the speech feature to read recipes • Customize various parts of the app such as theme, font size, categories. • Open recipes on your Android Wear watch Kiip rewards may be disabled in the settings My CookBook is also available on your desktop: http://www.mycookbook-online.net Create a free account on our online version My CookBook Online and you will enjoy these additional features (in the app and the website): • Save up to 105 recipes and 8 shopping lists in the cloud • Synchronize up to 105 recipes and 8 shopping lists between all your android applications and your online account • View and manage these recipes on any computer or any device • Invite your friends to join My CookBook Online and view their recipes • Plan your meals and generate a shopping list for the week Create a Premium account on My CookBook Online and : • All your recipes and shopping lists will be saved in the cloud More details here : http://www.mycookbook-online.net/pro/ The creation of an account on My CookBook Online is optional and the number of recipes is not limited in the Android application. We support more than 200 websites. If your favorite cooking website is not supported, you can submit a request or vote for already submitted requests here : http://www.mycookbook-online.net/siterequests/ My CookBook , the only cooking app you need ! We also have a free version of My CookBook which includes some ads : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.cookbook Help us to translate My CookBook to other languages : http://www.getlocalization.com/MyCookbook/ *** My CookBook Pro does not include a subscription for My CookBook Online Premium *** Key words : cook, cooking, recipe, shopping list, recipe manager, meal planner

description: Are you a true Pokemon master? Get ready to battle your way to the top of the leaderboards in any of 4 unique game modes that will thrill both casual and die-hard Pokemon fans. You’ll be challenged by questions covering the Pokemon card game, movies, TV shows, video games, manga books, and more! This is a game designed by Pokemon fans for Pokemon fans. Why settle for your average trivia quiz when you can now play with lively animation and over 40 sound effects in 1 player, 2 player, and team modes? Challenge your friends and then compete for high scores on our global leader board. FUNBLAST! has something for everyone with FOUR distinct, easy to play game modes for the price of one: ■ BET BIG: Hear the exciting sounds of a Las Vegas casino as you decide whether to bet small or BET IT ALL. Watch your winnings rack up as you double down -- or lose it all on that Pokemon factoid you swore you knew! ■ GO FAST! For those who like to live in the fast lane, you're awarded more points the faster you answer a question correctly. You'll even hear the roar of the race track as the game starts and the timer counts down. ■ TRIVIA FUN: Traditionalists will enjoy the simple fun of answering both easy and challenging questions with no pressure and no time limits. See the answers you missed, or keep it a mystery -- the choice is yours. ■ MILLIONAIRE: Enjoy the excitement of a classic game show as you try to answer all 12 questions correctly and become a FunBlast! Millionaire. The questions start out easy and then get harder as you go. Employ your own strategies by using your life-lines early or save them for later in the game. ====================== FunBlast! Features ====================== ■ MORE FUN with 12 Ways to Play: Get 4 game modes @ 1 player, 2 player, and Team play! ■ MORE GAME MODES: Bet Big, Go Fast, Trivia Fun, and Go Millionaire keep you hooked for hours. ■ BETTER QUESTIONS! With FunBlast! we challenge you with only the most interesting, intriguing, and entertaining Pokemon questions. Bring out your inner genius with 150 multiple choice questions (includes 50 bonus questions after free registration). ■ PROFESSIONAL GRAPHICS, lively animation, and over 40 sound effects bring your trivia game to life. ■ NO MORE REPEAT QUESTIONS: By default questions are never repeated before all new questions have been used and unlike competitors, this is tracked separately for each user who plays on your device. (Unlimited users supported!) ■ CONVENIENT SHOPPING: Easily tap a button to discover the best deals and most unique merchandise related to your trivia topic of choice. ■ GREATER FLEXIBILITY let's you disable sound effects, background music, etc. You're in control! ■ PERSONALIZE YOUR GAME and make it your own by adding your favorite background image to match your style or the trivia theme. Choose your own image or one of over 20 cool built-in backgrounds. ■ BETTER CUSTOMER SERVICE: We care about our customers and your total game experience. That's why we include a feedback and support button right on the main menu as well as on our website. ■ EXPANDABLE: Ready for more? Dozens of expansion packs are either available now or being added soon covering a wide range of traditional and pop culture topics. Don't be fooled by imitators or discouraged by junkware. When you want fun and you want the best, the choice is easy: FunBlast! Legal: Not affiliated with Nintendo. Any reference to third-party names, characters, products or other information is for convenience or educational purposes only and does not imply endorsement or sponsorship. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

description: Shows the currently playing track, album, and artist on the DashClock Widget NOTE: DashClock does not allow me to add buttons to the listing, so until support for that is added I will not be able to add play controls. Go to the settings to set what music player opens when you press the dashclock entry. Your player cannot be autodetected so it must be manually configured. Works with most music players. If your player does not work, try the suggestions below. If it still doesnt work then your player is not compatible because it does not broadcast out what its playing. Android 4.4+: Enable the Notification Listener setting to support any player that also supports the android lockscreen music controls. Android 4.3 and earlier: If your player has last.fm scrobbling support, enable that. If not, look for a setting to broadcast metadata and enable that. DashClock Music Extension requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik: http://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock Email any suggestions/issues to gonemadsoftware@gmail.com or visit the forums: http://gonemadmusicplayer.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=feedback Translations for the settings can be added here: http://www.getlocalization.com/DashClockMusicExtension/ PERMISSIONS: -com.android.vending.BILLING: Used for optional donations (in app purchase). This extension will always be 100% free but donations are welcome.
release_text: 2.2: -Fixed crash setting the default player -Updated target sdk to 21 (Android 5.0) Note: If the notification listener is not working, you might have to remove and readd the extension from being displayed in dashclock in order to start getting updates. Also if you are running 4.3 do not enable the notification listener. It only works on 4.4 and higher but google does not provide a way to hide it in 4.3

description: Shows the currently playing track and artist in Floatifications (Floating Notifications) along with buttons to control your music (play/pause/next/previous). Tapping on the next in the notification will launch the player of your choice (you must select the player to launch in the preferences). Pro features: -Show album art instead of default icon -Automatic downloading of album art -Customize what info is displayed and how it is formatted The album art feature works with many players but some players that use their own database might not work, so be sure to use the album art test before purchasing. Translations: http://www.getlocalization.com/FNMusicExtension/ Works with most music players. If your player does not work, try the suggestions below. If it still doesnt work then your player is not compatible because it does not broadcast out what its playing. Android 4.4+: Enable the Notification Listener setting to support any player that also supports the android lockscreen music controls. Android 4.3 and earlier: If your player has last.fm scrobbling support, enable that. If not, look for a setting to broadcast metadata and enable that. FN Music Extension requires Floatifications (Floating Notifications) by Rob J: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=robj.floating.notifications Email any suggestions/issues to gonemadsoftware@gmail.com or visit the forums: http://gonemadmusicplayer.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=fnfeedback PERMISSIONS: -com.android.vending.BILLING: Used for in app purchase of a pro version of this extension -android.permission.INTERNET: Used to download album art -android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used to download album art -android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used to save album art to storage
release_text: 2.2: -Fixed crash setting the default player -Updated target sdk to 21 (Android 5.0)

description: 這是一個免費的烏克麗麗/吉他/電吉他教學課程(不定期推出新課程)~ 內容包含: 1.每日三分鐘課程. 2.演奏曲教學. 3.彈唱歌曲教學. 4.樂理教學. 5.名人教學. 等等....將陸續更新內容~ 讓您每天花3分鐘就學好樂器~什麼都會彈~^_^ *請加入肥貓社團在學習後將您學習的成果拍成影片貼到社團中,肥貓會給您些建議,也可以跟大家一起交流,並在社團中分享或提出您的問題~ 肥貓Email : fatcatmusicworld@gmail.com 肥貓電話:0938523126 肥貓Face Book : https://www.facebook.com/fatcatmusicworld 肥貓社團 : https://www.facebook.com/groups/461598883926069/ 如果您還喜歡~請到肥貓的FaceBook或影片上留個言按個讚~ 或是給肥貓留下個好的評語~給肥貓一點鼓勵即可~!! 肥貓簡介: 肥貓是很愛音樂的街頭藝人(接洽各類型表演活動,包含公益活動)~ 肥貓有20年的教學經驗: 烏克麗麗(彈唱,演奏曲等各式技巧) 電吉他(各種樂風教授,速彈,Fingers style) 民謠吉他(鄉村搖滾,彈唱, Fingers style) 古典吉他(古典曲目教授) 音樂理論(樂理初級;中級;高級) 爵士鋼琴(初級) 肥貓愛這個世界~希望世界和平~希望愛與音樂充滿每個人的心靈~ 肥貓的音樂世界是他想要分享給大家的訊息~

description: Access your Android's built-in Linux command line shell. Unleash your inner geek! This is a new version of the popular "Android Terminal Emulator" application. Same great program, just with a new name. Top Features + Full Linux terminal emulation. + Multiple windows. + Launcher short cuts. + UTF-8 text. (Arabic, Chinese, Greek, Hebrew, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Thai, etc.) + Completely free. No ads, no in-app-purchases, no nag screens, nothing. Quick FAQ: + If you are having trouble entering text, try installing the free "Hacker's Keyboard IME". (Especially if you have a Samsung or HTC device.) + This app isn't a game emulator. + This app won't help you root your phone or change your phone's IMEI. + You need to know (or be willing to learn) how to use the Linux command line to use this app. + You may want to install a set of command line utilities like "Busy Box" or "Debian chroot" in order to add commands beyond the commands that come built into your Android device. + If you get a -505 error when trying to install this app under Android 5.0, it means that some other app is using the same permissions. You will have to uninstall the other app in order to install Terminal Emulator for Android. (People tell me that "jrummy's Toolbox Pro" causes this problem.) Want to know more about Terminal Emulator for Android? Join the G+ community: #Android Terminal Emulator https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/106164413936367578283 Or check out the documentation wiki: http://github.com/jackpal/Android-Terminal-Emulator/wiki Want to add or improve a translation of Terminal Emulator for Android? See https://github.com/jackpal/Android-Terminal-Emulator/wiki/Translating-to-Other-Languages for instructions.

description: Photo Frame Widget is an application to decorate a home screen with lots of photo frames inserting your precious pictures. How to add Widget 1. Press space of Home screen for 2~3 secs. 2. Select Widget when shows Popup window or icon menu up. 3. Select Photo Frame Widget on the widget list. And it will put a frame widget into space of home. Feature 1. 1x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x2, 4x4, 5x5 Size Frame 2. Directly insert image by taking picture. 3. Picture auto change is possible by setting option. 4. Can add effect into a picture. (Grayscale, Sepia, Brightening, Darkening, Sharpening, Smooth etc..) 5. Can make background image with frames. 6. Search images by web and adjust those. 7. Can convert a photo frame to a shortcut icon. (shortcut to : calling phone, sending message, launching an app) 8. Can use a frame image which is made by you or downloaded from web. ( Needed to put images into SDCard , folder path : PhotoFrameData/CustomFrame/ )

description: It should be fun to practice an instrument, and we think this metronome app can help with that. The virtual drum machine lets you play all the built in grooves, in any time signature and tempo you dial in. With all the functionality you can expect from an advanced metronome, this android app also gives you fine control over the swing level. The grooves are programmed to fit your music whether you play jazz, blues, pop, rock, bossa, samba, salsa, waltz or reggae etc. It does not matter if you play guitar, bass, piano, drums, percussion or any other instrument. Whether you are a professional musician or an enthusiast there are ways to make this metronome work for you. Improvise to any built in rhythm or practice to improve your timing. Learn to keep a steady pulse or find new beats. While the metronome is playing you can still modify parameters like tempo, time signature, shuffle and freely customize the swing level. You can set the swing on either eighths or sixteenths. From the settings menu you can activate the vibration feature, change the sound of the metronome or even set the color theme. These features helps when you are live on stage and need a discrete tempo indication. Use earphones, or plug into your amplifier or PA-system during band rehearsal to get the best experience. Practice becomes fun with a metronome that knows how to groove!
release_text: * Improved sound quality and dynamics * Added percussion on latin grooves * Added three new styles: Reggae, Double kick, "Rosanna" * A lot of styles has been reworked * Now supports Android 5 The reason for new permissions is that we now uses a system for automatic crash reports

description: 혼자 하는 중국어, 첫걸음 교과서 투게더와 함께! * 상세한 설명과 원어민 발음으로 중국어 발음 완전 정복 * 기본회화와 실전회화로 단계적인 중국어 학습 가능 * 독학 중국어 교재의 바이블, 혼자서도 중국어 왕초보 탈출 * No.1 중국전문 포털 [www.JRChina.com] 을 통한 입체적 학습 가능 ◎ 강좌소개 - 중국어 교육 전문업체 JRC 에듀에서 출시하는 『가장 쉬운 중국어 첫걸음』강좌. - 출간부터 현재까지 중국어 왕초보 베스트셀러인 JRC 북스의《가장 쉬운 중국어 첫걸음 교과서 투게더》교재를 바탕으로한 강좌. - 중국어 교육 전문가 JRC 연구진이 다년간의 강좌와 교재 집필 경험을 바탕으로 제작한 강좌. ◎ 학습 대상 - 중국어 완전 초보자 - 발음부터 성조, 기초를 정확히 다지고자 하는 학습자 - 단기간 내에 중국어 기본기를 마스터하고자 하는 자 - 쉬운 표현으로 중국어 회화를 익히고 싶은 학습자 ◎ 강좌 구성 Part 1. 발음 01. 단운모와 성모 02. 운모 4총사 03. 성조가 뭐죠? description: Use your Microsoft Windows PC as remote dialer for managing incoming and outgoing calls and for writing and receiving SMS messages. Look for missed incoming calls in your call log, read your SMS and use your phone contacts for dialing and creating SMS messages. All from your Windows desktop via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth.... Ideal in conjunction with a Bluetooth headset. You can leave your phone in the docking station while managing your calls. The additional Microsoft Office integration allows simple dialing and SMS creation direct from Outlook, Word and Excel. Also look for the 15 day trial version "Remote Phone Call Trial". Simply the remote control for your mobile phone! CallCenter features (app running on your PC): - Shows phone contacts - Shows call log - Allows dialing contacts, call log entries and entered numbers - Writing and reading SMS messages - Contact search - Answer incoming calls - Popup for incoming calls and SMS messages - Manage audio settings - Hotkey for dialing numbers from the clipboard - Hotkey for accepting incoming calls - Handle "tel" and "callto" ULRs - Auto start at windows login CallCenter Microsoft Office integration: - Allows dialing selected numbers using the context menu of the text editor (Outlook, Excel and Word) - Allows calling email sender and recipients with help of contact information (Outlook) RemotePhone features (app running on your phone): - Auto start with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth - Acoustic signal on connect - Show connection status - Send or download client installation package to your Microsoft Windows PC System requirements: - Android 2.0 or higher - a Microsoft Windows PC (XP or newer) - a Wi-Fi (WLAN) environment or a Bluetooth* enabled PC - optional: Microsoft Office 2007 or newer *Supported Bluetooth stacks: default Microsoft stack, WIDCOMM stack The PC application CallCenter offers a programming interface (API), which allows developers the use of the remote control features within arbitrary own applications. The SDK together with a sample can be found in the subdirectory "SDK" within the installation directory on your PC. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@justremotephone.com ! We cannot respond to comments left on Google Play.
release_text: - new: Extended features for rooted phones (see www.justremotephone.com) - new: WiFi network filter for autostart feature - fixed: Answering calls not possible on Android 5.0 - fixed: Some special characters like # cannot be dialed - fixed: Client setup sometimes fails with DLL not found

description: With this app you have clear weather all weather conditions and in different colors and tiles View. You can store and display up to 7 cities. Features: - 7 cities save and show - GPS support - Complete, accurate weather data - Ice warning (for example for your car) - Barometer Trend - Sunrise / sunset, day length - Moonrise / moonset, moon phase - Landscape Weather data: - Weather situation as text - Temperature - Chill Temperature - Humidity in% - Max / Min temperature of the day - Air pressure - Wind speed and direction - Dew point with ice warning - Visibility in km or miles * - 4 days preview, picture, Min, Max, rain probability, weather situation - Sun: Sunrise, Sunset, Day length *, time - Moon: rise, fall, phase as text and image * - Precipitation Radar (Germany), animated - Map (if outside Germany) - Current Zodiac - Settings * If available for the city Settings: - Temperature in ° C or ° F - Wind speed in km / h, mph, knots, m / s, Beaufort - Air pressure in mb, hPa, Torr, psi, inchHG - 7 cities with test function and GPS or select from map

description: ▣ 자전거 등록/조회 서비스 – 바이크서치 ▣ 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 끝! 스마트한 자전거 등록/조회 서비스! 바이크서치(BikeSearch)는 자전거를 등록하고, 조회하고, 도난/분실 신고하는 서비스입니다. (★ 2013 LBS 활용 앱&웹 공모전 방송통신위원회위원장상 수상) [자전거 등록 서비스] - 구입과 함께 찾아오는 자전거 도난/분실의 공포 - 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 내 자전거 등록 끝! - 없어진 내 자전거, 불법 유통되는 건 용납 못 해! - 중고 자전거 팔 때도, 안전하게 등록된 자전거니까 OK [자전거 조회 서비스] - 중고 자전거 사고 팔 때, 묻지마 거래는 이제 그만! - 차대번호만 입력하면 자전거 정보와 소유자 정보가 한 번에! - 사고 싶은데, 도난 자전거면 어쩌지? 조회 한 번이면, 걱정 끝! [도난/분실 신고 서비스] - 자전거가 없어진 현장에서 바로, 실시간 도난/분실 신고! - 도난/분실 위치 찍고 시간 입력하면, 바로 도난 자전거 지도에 업데이트! - 현상금 추가 기능으로 내 자전거 빠르게 찾기 시도 - 댓글 제보로 하나되는 우리 동네 자전거 지킴이 서비스 [NFC 태그 서비스] - 특수 제작된 바이크서치 NFC 태그를 자전거에 부착 - 등록된 내 자전거 정보를 바이크서치 NFC 태그에 저장 - 스마트폰만 접촉(NFC 기능 ON)하면 손쉽게 등록 정보 조회 - 중고 자전거 거래 시, 도난/분실 의심 자전거 발견 시 접촉만 하면 뙇! (등록방법 보기) http://youtu.be/fcUAat8QSHc (조회방법 보기) http://youtu.be/OOaWj20nm9o ※ 응? 차대번호가 뭔가요? - 차대번호는 자전거 프레임에 새겨진 고유의 번호로 영어와 숫자 조합으로 이루어져 있습니다. By 9LAB [바이크서치 웹사이트] www.bikesearch.co.kr [바이크서치 페이스북] https://www.facebook.com/bikesearch 추천 TAG ] ------------------------- 바이크서치, bikesearch, 자전거, 자전거등록제, 자전거조회, 차대번호, 도난, 신고, NFC, 태그, 바이크, bike, bicycle, 4대강, 노원구자전거, Tranggle, 트랭글, 에코마일리지, GPS, 속도계, 행복나눔, 두바퀴, mtb, 국토종주, 삼천리, 바이크앤 ---- 개발자 연락처 : info@9lab.kr

description: With the official FC Red Bull Salzburg App powered by A1 you can receive all the info on the Red Bulls straight on your iPhone! Latest news, videos, fixtures, live match updates, press conferences and the training schedule for the boys are now on hand for you. Plus with user-defined push notifications you will be updated with news and developments as they happen. Should you wish, you can change the language in the settings to read all content in German. CONTENTS - LIVE (Ticker incl. live updates, statistics & line-up) - Real-time PUSH NOTIFICATIONS (Topics: matches, offers, news) - Latest FC Red Bull Salzburg NEWS - VIDEOS incl. live streams of our press conferences - TEAMS (Overview of squads) - SEASON (Fixtures, table, training schedule) - CALENDAR (Save all the fixtures in your calendar with an iCal file) - TICKETS (Match ticket info, online shop) - RED BULL ARENA (Stadium, arrival, tours) - SOCIAL MEDIA (All channels at a glance)
release_text: - New Splash Screen - Update Online Ticket-Shop - Update Getting tot he RBA - Bug Fixes

description: This is open source project. You can find sources here - https://github.com/Nikolay-Kha/TabletClock Do you have old tablet? Or do you want to make your lovely device to show time and weather forecast when it on charging? This application for you! Nowadays wall clock are quite stupid, but price for them is a little bit less that price for tablet PC. And weather station is expensive. So, why do you need to buy stupid clock or expensive weather station when you can take this application and the cheapest table pc or old useless one and get smart clock: - they wouldn't lost time during blackouts. And it even doesn't require batteries for that, because device already has rechargeable battery - screen brightness is auto adjustable. Even if your device has not light sensor - application use camera as light sensor (disabled in settings by default) - you can choose one of 16 million color for displaying - alarm clock from Android OS - displaying current date, sunset and sunrise - weather now, forecast for one day each 6 hour and forecast on next week: temperature, wind speed and direction, pressure, clouds, precipitation and if sky is clear - moon phase, Units for temperature, speed and pressure are adjustable. - automatic start and close application on plugged/unplugged charger ( disabled in settings by default ) - and even do not have to set up time on this clock, because Android OS could take time from network and you will have exact time! You can use this application for your lovely device like screen saver while charging. Especially for devices with dock stations. Just turn on autorun and autoclose feature in settings and clock will appear while device is docking. Tips: On first launch choose your city for weather forecast. If your device have navigation bar, it will be hidden on application start. Any touch return navigation bar to screen, is not affecting on application. Touch the alarm clock icon to show system alarm clock. Touch the time to show application menu (the same as menu button, in case if your device does not have menu button). Touch the weather to switch two types of forecast - dayly and weekly. If your device does not has a light sensor, but it has camera, better front, turn on brightness adjusting using camera in settings - it will measure light every 30 seconds. But if you run this on unplugged device it will decrease on-battery time. Time and date format are taken from system. If you need brightness lower that your device allows, change in settings -> text color value R, G, B to lower ones. For example: if you change green (#00FF00) to 80 instead of FF, brightness will twice lower. You can choose screen rotation in settings. Weather provided by OpenWeatherMap - http://openweathermap.org All weather data are provided under the CC-BY-SA 2.0 license - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0
release_text: v1.3 api key added v1.2 weather forecast now keeps in device memory, so app could show forecast even without internet screen rotation, portrait mode navigation bar remover improved date text over-filling fixed minor bugs+cosmetic fixes v1.1 android 4.4 KitKat support 2560x1600 devices support improved auto brightness adjustment using camera icons brightness now is depend on text brightness minor bugs fixes

description: This application is a useful tool to help you improve your English. We hope this application will prove to be a useful tool to help improve your English reading and listening skills. It is a collection of free English text and audio files we have gathered from the internet. We have put them together in one convenient place for easy access. The application connects you directly to our private server and allows you to download the files straight to your phone. The files are saved in the folder /sdcard/ListenEnglish. The first time you run the program you will see a message saying, “The English texts and audio files don’t exist on your phone. Would you like to download?” Choose ‘Accept’ to confirm. You will then be able to choose which files you would like to download. If you find that you cannot access the files after downloading them, simply navigate to the folder, delete the files, and re-download them. The more you download the more storage space it will occupy on your phone or sd card. Data charges may occur according to your data plan. The more data is used the more you may be charged. Wi-fi connections normally do not use the 3G network, so data rates do not apply. We will be updating our server from time to time adding more English text and audio files for you to enjoy. Updated lists will be automatically applied and available for viewing. *keyword Audio Book/English Listening/Study English/LC/Free Listening/Read Book/Read English/English Book/
release_text: v1.2 # The first run-time error correction. v1.1 # download problem fixed.

description: Lynkee turns your camera phone into a QR and product barcode scanner. Lynkee is regularly ranked as top performer in this category for its features, ergonomics and quick scanning. Lynkee 2 offers you a whole bunch of interesting new features and improvement: Optional and dedicated internal browser, Facebook and Twitter login, QR Generator, product search engine, keytags, Led Flash, faster scanning, history, price and satisfaction comparator …just download and enjoy it ! You can scan a QR code, Datamatrix and consumer product barcodes (EAN/UPC) in real-time and for a multitude of 2D code type: URL, Geo-location, Product, VCard, Mecard, SMS, Phone Number, Authentication, Text, Mail, Bookmarks… You may create your URL, text or contact QR codes with easy ; also you may generate for free your own QR codes on www.qreasy.com Lynkee more social ! …Edit your own Lynkee profile on your mobile or on www.lynkee.com: * Share your scan * Follow-up your activities (scans, bookmarks ...) on your laptop/tablet on www.lynkee.com * Share your generated QR codes * Add and share your product reviews Enter in the lynkee network !
release_text: Lolipop support

description: Sudoku - Puzzle, develop your memory and thinking. If you've been in a book store in the last six months - or an airport, waiting room or college lecture class - you've probably seen someone staring at a sudoku. Given its popularity, one might think it's some new type of porn. But no, it's just a puzzle. It's a widespread, logic-based fad of a puzzle that is simple enough to suck you in and difficult enough to keep you hooked. In this article, we'll find out what a sudoku puzzle entails, how to go about solving one and where the concept originated (hint: It's not Japan. Let's get started. Sudoku is a game of numbers - specifically, the numbers 1 through 9 - but it really isn't about math. It's about logic. Instead of 1 through 9, you could use the first nine letters of the alphabet or a set of nine symbols, and it would be the same game. The basis of sudoku is a nine-by-nine grid. You've got three sections to think about: rows, columns and boxes. The goal of sudoku is to fill each nine-square row, each nine-square column and each nine-square box with the numbers 1 through 9, with each number used once and only once in each section. It's the interaction between the rows, columns and boxes that tells you where the numbers need to go. So if you were to start with a blank grid and fill in the numbers for row 1, column 2 and box 4 according to the sudoku rules. Of course, starting with a blank grid wouldn't make it much of a challenge. A sudoku puzzle already has some of the numbers filled in, and it's your job to figure out where the rest of the numbers go. Differences from the free version: - More games. - No advertising. Options: - 3 seasons with 150 games. 5 levels of difficulty. - Very comfortable dynamic keyboard to quickly select the correct number. - Rating game users with display of the country. - Displays the number of entering and remaining digits. - Painting numbers on the keypad at its full entry into the game (9 digits). - Add notes and more.
release_text: - New season games (150 games). - Fixed some bugs.

description: Find pairs and collect magical gems through multiple levels of raising difficulty in this unique game inspired by mahjong solitaire. Features: * Multiple levels, * Minigames (Memory and Rivers), * Hand drawn fantasy graphics, * Lives, * Zoom in and out, * Gems, * Dynamic fantasy music, * Challenging game play - beat the time bar! Turn off shadows on slower phones.
release_text: 1.50 15 new levels No need to unlock levels anymore Bug fixes

description: Forty Thieves is a challenging solitaire requiring some skill and patience. On easy level you can go through the stock three times which makes it much easier though. On hard level cards on the tableu that are not on top are hidden. The game is more suited for tablets and large phones because there is a lot of cards on screen - on small screen phones you might have problems navigating (480x320 is absolute minimum resolution). Rules - click on the left stack to get new card, - move all cards to foundations - from Ace to King, - you can place a card on another card if it's higher and is the same suit or put it on an empty space, - you can move only one card at a time Features - high resolution - undo - saving state - clean cards - zoom Check also our other solitaires!
release_text: 1.50 - stats - many improvements

description: The most popular solitaire in the world - Klondike Solitaire also known as Patience - with clear graphics perfect for phones and tablets of every screen size. Rules - move cards from A to K to foundations, - build piles down by altering colors (8 diamond on 9 cross), - in hard difficulety you can pass the deck only three time, Tips how to win - try not to move cards from top deck (waste) to your piles unless you really need them, - move cards to foundations (A to K on the top right) quickly, - use undo to solve harder cases. Features - autosave, you don't need to worry when a phone calls interupting your game, - three difficulty levels: draw 1 Klondike Solitaire (easy), draw 3 Klondike Solitaire (medium and hard) - score, - undo, - easy moving of cards (you can move whole pile even if you need to only move one card!), - smooth animations, - double click to move cards to foundation, - high resolution for ICS tablets and phones, - zoom In this release some things are not yet ready - but expect them soon: - music, - image backgrounds (right now you can only change colour), - additional card deck (like in Spider Solitaire HD). From the makers of Spider Solitaire HD.
release_text: Statistics. Many improvements.

description: Engaging puzzle platformer with adventure and arcade elements. Lead a wizardess, a troll and a knight on a journey home by jumping, collecting coins, solving puzzles, fighting monsters and interacting with funny creatures. Excellent 2D side-scroller for both casual and avid players in love with retro games with head-scratching puzzles and humorous dialogues voiced in a fun bable-talk. New levels coming soon. This is initial version, please report any problems.
release_text: 1.55 Fixes related to level 9 issues - thank for those who reported them! Polish translation 1.50 Blue episode with new levels

description: Classic Lines game - slide marbles to make lines of five. HD graphics makes it perfect for tablets and large phones. The game also has dynamite, stone marbles and question marks that make it more interesting and even more addictive! Try to get the best highscore!
release_text: 1.60 Local highscores

description: Dynamic memory game with physics - for kids, little children and adults! Requires good memory and reflexes. Allows training memory in kids and provides lots of fun. With multiplayer mode! Features: ★ physics engine, ★ 28 Water levels ★ 28 Ice levels ★ 28 Earth levels ★ 28 Christmas levels ★ hot seat multiplayer ★ additional Classic levels similar to classic memory game ★ collect stars and try to beat your highscore, ★ three difficulty levels, ★ funny pictures and animated creatures that help or make matters worse, children will love it! ★ lives, ★ fun music, ★ multilayered levels, ★ fish and birds making things a little harder and a pigeon that saves drowning tiles for you, ★ dragon that eats the tile - you have to find the pair for it before the dragon spits it, ★ carnivorous plant that eats images ★ mole that throws tiles off the screen ★ quality setting allowing you to play even on older phones, ★ HD graphics looks astounding even on large Honeycomb tablets like Asus Transformer, Motorola Xoom or Galaxy Tab, Try your memory! The game uses physics engine and adds multiple hurdles and aids to spice up the classical game of finding pairs of pictures. It's suitable for all ages - even children as young as 4 will find it amusing (especially on easy difficulty setting). Find all pairs before they drown in the rising water or are pushed out of screen by fish. If you found a bug or it doesn't work on your device - please contact us, we'll fix it as fast as we can. If you comment about problems - please write what device do you use - so we can check and correct any bugs! The game uses libGDX and box2D libraries.
release_text: This game has no ads now. Enjoy!

description: Long time ago on a planet far far away there was a tribe of creatures called the Fluffies. They lived in peace until an Evil Fluffie stole all their sleepy brothers and scattered them in a strange space-time dimensions... Fluffies went through a portal to save their friends one by one and to defeat the Evil Fluffies... Push the Fluffies is a game where you push small creatures into portals to other dimensions to save them troughout different levels. Beautiful hand drawn graphics and engaging music combined with addicting gameplay will provide you hours of fun. More levels and improvements coming soon. Please report any bugs to the developer e-mail account. The game may require a high end phone or tablet to work smoothly. It is inspired by Lemmings but has quite a different game play.
release_text: 1.50 20 new levels in the Red Herring episode Bomb fluffies in Red Herring episode (upon request) Optimisation

description: Russian Solitaire is less known but very involving solitaire similar to Yukon. When playing 2 or 4 suits use undo to win! Features: - high resolutions for tablets and larger phones, - clean cards, - undo, - saving state, - 1 suit (easy), 2 suit (hard, use undo!), 4 suit (very hard, a real challenge) Rules - You can move any group of not reversed cards, - You can drop cards when card below has the same suit and is one point higher than the starting card, - You can put only Kings on empty places Tips - Try to release reversed card ASAP, - Don't move cards to the foundation too soon, they may be needed later Check our other solitaires!
release_text: Stats&Hints

description: Spiderette is a simpler version of Spider Solitaire. Clean cards and great graphics in this edition allow you to play for hours in one of the less known, but still very interesting solitaires. Rules: - it's a Spider Solitaire with one deck instead of two, - clicking on piles on the right deals new cards, - you have to build sequences from King to Ace, - moving requires the card to be in sequence and follow suit. Features: - undo, - saving state, - 1, 2 and 4 suit modes (easy, medium, hard), - restarting the same game. Check also our Spider Solitaire HD!
release_text: 1.40 - hints, - statistics,

description: You don't need expensive, ineffective gadgets or complicated training routines in order to loose fat and improve fitness condition. A few but challenging minutes of our predefined body weight, high intensity interval workouts including cardio, plyometric, strength and balance exercises will quickly convince you that strong will and half an hour per day is more than enough for achieving your goals. If you are not familiar with any of the exercises from the included workouts, you can find short description for each one in section Workouts Library. The app also offers easy to use and configure timer that allows you define your own interval training. Set number of rounds, duration of working cycles and rest time and you can start! -------------- Overview on functionalities: - 3 predefined Tabata workouts (Tabata for beginners, Tabata for legs and Tabata for upper body) - Option to create your own tabata workout choosing between 20 bodyweight cardio moves - 3 predefined Bodyweigth workouts (Cardio for beginners, Cardio for intermediate/advanced, Strength) - Option to create your own Bodyweight workout choosing between 20 bodyweight cardio moves - 3 predefined 10-minute Challenges ( Plank Challenge, Burpee Challenge, Squat Challenge) - Configurable and easy to set up countdown timer - Alarm sound between work and rest periods. Alarm volume is controlled by the volume controls of your device - Warning ticks during the last three seconds of each interval - Workouts library with short description of each exercise, included in the predefined workouts -------------- Please feel free to write suggestions, comments, error reports or feedback to our e-mail as we cannot answer the comments - we will be more than happy to help and hear from our users!
release_text: Version 1.3.1: - Section Create Workout lets you set Rest/Working time, as well choose your exercises from a list of the 20 most popular once - New exercises were added to section Create Tabata Version 1.3.1.1: minor bug fixes Version 1.3.0: New predefined workouts, changes in the user interface, minor fixes of bugs.

description: このアプリは、「数学ナビ」（２００円） に全て含まれています。 過去の都道府県の公立高校入試について、一次関数、二次関数、反比例、図形（合同、相似、三平方、面積、長さ）、因数分解に関する問題を参考にプログラムしてあります。関数などの問題は、解く度に数値が変わるようにプログラムしてあります。 問題には、（１）、（２）、（３）などと「流れ」があります。画面の選択肢に触れることで、正解、不正解がでるとともに、それぞれの問題の流れを体験して下さい。 「因数分解」： 展開、たすきがけ、因数分解 「関数」： 北海道、青森、神奈川、新潟、滋賀、高知、東京 「図形」： 福岡、愛媛、広島、大阪、愛知、東京、新潟、沖縄 このアプリは、「数学ナビ」（２００円 ）に全て含まれています。 2014.02.07 追加項目 沖縄県の図形問題（２０１３年、２０１２年、２０１１年）を追加しました。 展開と因数分解１を加えました。 This app contains all the "math Navi" (200 yen). For public high school entrance examination of prefectures in the past, and has been programmed to reference the problem linear function, quadratic function, inverse proportion, (joint, similarity, three square, area, length), about the factorization figure. The problems such as function, you may have to program the number is to vary every time you solve. The problem is (1), (2), etc. (3) is "flow". By touching the screen of choice, correct, incorrect answers with Dell, to experience the flow of each problem. "Factorization": Deployment, cross-coupled, factorization "Functions": Hokkaido, Aomori, Kanagawa, Niigata, Shiga, Kochi, Tokyo "Shapes": Fukuoka, Ehime, Hiroshima, Osaka, Aichi, Tokyo, Niigata, Okinawa This app contains all the "math Navi" (200 yen). 2014.02.07 additional item I added (2013, 2012, 2011) the shape of the Okinawa problem. I added a factorization and one deployment.
release_text: 「関数」に、東京を追加しました。 「図形」に、新潟を追加しました。
